title: Young Man finding his way around church, faith, love, career, marriage.
description:
Eli shares his story. Raised Missouri Synod Lutheran now worshipping in an Assemblies of God. He love CS Lewis. He's trained as an EMT but is looking to be a fire fighter. He's dating a woman who identifies as Bi-sexual. He's got a lot of things to figure out. So we have a chat.

Sam Harris and CS Lewis

Born in Colorado, lived there until 5 years old

Missouri Synod Lutherans, In Iowa until 10 years old

Public school high school

Had a stutter

Air force reserve

Emt certification

Firefighting positions

YMCA in the Rocky Mountains, 

Altar call books, 

See a take on faith considering all the options

Non-believers resentful of believers

Studied English, working as a carpenter, still trying to be a fire fighter

Making disciples of all nations

Colorado State: the quad where everyone does their causes

Very frustrated with their approach to it. 

Sola Scriptura kind of stuff

Jonathan Haidt, 

People have so much information, 

What can't be contradicted, it's not just a formula, it's something that applies into your life

Lost World of Genesis One

Never hung out with people outside of church,

Assemblies of God, it's a massive church

Certain hesitation

Questions either not worth asking or forbidden to be asked, taken as literal without a symbolic or mysterious meaning

John Walton takes an agnostic approach, presents the arguments, it's a functional story

CS Lewis the Apologist Evening Prayer

Mythopea Tolkien Poem
